scripts.dev: echo 'Starting Wails dev mode...' && $(go env GOPATH)/bin/wails dev
scripts.build: echo 'Building frontend first...' && cd ../web && pnpm build && cd ../desktop && cp -r ../web/dist web && echo 'Building Wails application...' && $(go env GOPATH)/bin/wails build
scripts.build:debug: echo 'Building Wails application in debug mode...' && $(go env GOPATH)/bin/wails build -debug
scripts.lint: echo 'No linting configured for Go files'
